DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to develop a program to help people to lower their chances of being violently injured again.
DOC.brief_title: Assessing and Reducing Risk of Violent Re-Injury Among Victims of Urban Violence
DOC.criteria: age between 1865 years intentionally injured in community violence. admitted to a Level 1 trauma center able to provide voluntary informed consent under the age of 18 or over the age of 55. not fluent in the English language patients with suspected mental retardation or active psychosis as determined by brief clinical screen. patients currently in legal detention status
